title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 892-1.2 - Commencement of amendment process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 892-1.2 - Commencement of amendment process

State Regulations

Any cable television company or municipality proposing to
amend a cable television franchise shall commence the formal amendment process
by written notice sent to the other party and to the commission. The notice
shall contain the text or set forth the substance of the proposed
amendment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
892-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
